SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into seminar (topic, intro, `state`, sign_up_start_time, sign_up_end_time, presentation_order_mode, team_num_limit, report_end_time) values (#{topic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{signUpStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{signUpEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{presentationOrderMode,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{teamNumLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reportEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update seminar set topic = #{topic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sign_up_start_time = #{signUpStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sign_up_end_time = #{signUpEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, presentation_order_mode = #{presentationOrderMode,jdbcType=TINYINT}, team_num_limit = #{teamNumLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, report_end_time = #{reportEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, topic, intro, `state`, sign_up_start_time, sign_up_end_time, presentation_order_mode, team_num_limit, report_end_time from seminar where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, topic, intro, `state`, sign_up_start_time, sign_up_end_time, presentation_order_mode, team_num_limit, report_end_time from seminar
